name: ArkWorks
overview:
The primary goal of the ArkWorks product is to enable companies to greatly reduce the need for paper documents and to eliminate most of the processes associated with producing and managing paper documents.

Since its release, ArkWorks has continually improved its technology to provide the best and most secure paperless office software on the market. The most recent enhancement being the ability to back up your files to an offsite storage facility.

The ArkWorks program has received several accolades, including a 5 Star overall rating from CPA Technology Advisor. They reviewed such topics as Usability, Document Organization, Annotation, Integration, Records Management, and Relative Value.
